roleset.name: look at briefly
roleset.note: GLANCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'glance' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 30.3, Framenet entry Perception active. (from glance.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: I felt the temblor begin and glanced at the table next to mine, smiled that guilty smile and we both mouthed the words, ``Earth-quake!'' together.
example.arg: at the table next to mine
